definition.name: NXcg_unit_normal_set

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays.

symbol.name: d
symbol.doc: The dimensionality, which has to be at least 2.

symbol.name: c
symbol.doc: The cardinality of the set, i.e. the number of unit normals.

definition.doc: Computational geometry description of a set of (oriented) unit normal vectors.

field.name: orientation
field.doc:
Qualifier how which specifically oriented normal to its primitive each normal represents.
* 0 - undefined * 1 - outer * 2 - inner
